channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Customer Data Cloud (Gigya)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Customer Data Cloud (Gigya)

item.title: CVE-2022-41210|2024-08-03T12:35:49.562Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20customer%20data%20cloud%20%28gigya%29
item.description: SAP Customer Data Cloud (Gigya mobile app for Android) - version 7.4, uses insecure random number generator program which makes it easy for the attacker to predict future random numbers. This can lead to information disclosure and modification of certain user settings.

item.title: CVE-2022-41209|2024-08-03T12:35:49.635Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20customer%20data%20cloud%20%28gigya%29
item.description: SAP Customer Data Cloud (Gigya mobile app for Android) - version 7.4, uses encryption method which lacks proper diffusion and does not hide the patterns well. This can lead to information disclosure. In certain scenarios, application might also be susceptible to replay attacks.
